hackathon-description-text: begins this Saturday, April 8, 2018 at Texas Southern University. Join the creative, innovative group of students for 24 amazing hours of hacking in Houston, Texas. We are inviting all students to come build cool gadgets, develop slick software projects, solve challenges, network, collect free swag and win big prizes.
hackathon-requirements: Build projects with originality in mind
hackathon-rules:
All projects must be built from scratch during the event. Read through and accept our 
. Obviously, alcohol, drugs, firearms, knives, weapons (including toys) are strictly prohibited.

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: Enter the Hackathon raffle for this prize

hackathon-prizes.prize-title: Roku Sponsored: Roku Players / Swag Bag

hackathon-location-google-maps: https://maps.google.com/?q=3100 Cleburne St, Houston, TX 77004, USA

hackathon-judging-criteria.judging-criterion: What technologies were used to build the project
How useful can this be used in the future to solve problems that exist
How well your team presents the project
